net.sf.saxon.event
Interface SaxonLocator

All Superinterfaces:
LocationProvider, org.xml.sax.Locator, javax.xml.transform.SourceLocator
All Known Subinterfaces:
InstructionInfo
All Known Implementing Classes:
DocumentSender, DOMSender, ExpressionLocation, InstructionDetails, ReceivingContentHandler, StyleElement, TraceExpression, XQueryFunction
public interface SaxonLocator
extends org.xml.sax.Locator, javax.xml.transform.SourceLocator, LocationProvider

SaxonLocator: this interface exists to unify the SAX Locator and JAXP SourceLocator interfaces, which are identical. It extends both interfaces. Therefore, anything that implements SaxonLocator can be used both in SAX and in JAXP interfaces.

Methods inherited from interface org.xml.sax.Locator
getColumnNumber, getLineNumber, getPublicId, getSystemId
